org.artoolkit.ar6.base.rendering.gles20

Interface ARDrawableOpenGLES20

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CubeGLES20, LineGLES20

    public interface ARDrawableOpenGLES20
    Interface should be used for all classed that paint some geometry in the space. Like CubeGLES20 or LineGLES20 It ensures that the needed methods draw(float[], float[]) and setShaderProgram(ShaderProgram) are implemented by these classes.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(float[] projectionMatrix, float[] modelViewMatrix) 
      void setShaderProgram(ShaderProgram program)
